content.raw: I was debugging an occasional failure of the `INTEGRATION_joint_revolute` test during one of the bullet sub-tests after a `Joint::Detach` function is called. The error occurs since that function is basically deleting the joint without calling Fini, so the applyDamping callback might cause problems. Please consider merging a132f13 (branch `bullet_joint_teardown`) into this pull request.
content.html: I was debugging an occasional failure of the INTEGRATION_joint_revolute test during one of the bullet sub-tests after a Joint::Detach function is called. The error occurs since that function is basically deleting the joint without calling Fini, so the applyDamping callback might cause problems. Please consider merging a132f13 (branch bullet_joint_teardown) into this pull request.
